Changing UNIX On Call

Change the Service Desk On Call Contact List Remember to set the next person on call after you as Manager

  1. http://taitc212/html/uspsd_contacts/uspsd_contacts.html
  2. Login to taitc113 (OpenView Server) and change the script to generate pages for tickets. You can either login directly on ssh from taitc118 
     ssh taitc113
  3. Make a copy of the file 
    sudo cp /var/opt/OV/Tenneco/lbin/Prod_Send_UNIX_admin.sh /var/opt/OV/Tenneco/lbin/Prod_Send_UNIX_admin.sh.$(date +%m%d%y)
  4. Edit the file
    sudo vi /var/opt/OV/Tenneco/lbin/Prod_Send_UNIX_admin.sh

    chnage the Phone Number@Carrier sequence in the line echo ”To:4438783970@tmomail.net” » /var/opt/OV/Tenneco/Oracle_Log/file3.txt with your data from the table below and save the file.

#### Kapils cell phone number
##$UNIXONCALL=“4438783970@tmomail.net“
#### Chris S cell phone number
#$UNIXONCALL=“2244565077@VTEXT.com“
#### Robert B cell phone number
#$UNIXONCALL=“3123718267@VTEXT.com“
